title: WATCH: A closeup look of Dineo Moeketsi's glittering diamond wedding ring
text:
WATCH: A closeup look of Dineo Moeketsi's glittering diamond wedding ring share this

Cape Town - TV personality Dineo Moeketsi provided her one million Instagram followers with a 360-degree view of her sparkly yellow diamond wedding ring.

"Still takes my breath away every time I look at this," Dineo shared with her husband, rapper Solo on Instagram.

South African diamond cutters Nungu Diamonds shared the video on Instagram, revealing more about the symbolism in the caption, writing: "A yellow diamond for his Mrs Langa. Forever his sun. A symbol to remind me that I've always been and will always be his diamond."

TAKE A LOOK AT THE PHOTO HERE:

The couple tied the knot in a traditional ceremony in May and celebrated their union with a white wedding ceremony in October.

The lead up to their Western-style white wedding, as well as the wedding itself, formed part of the three-part documentary Kwakuhle Kwethu which aired on 1Magic in September.

Produced by the couple themselves, the personal look into their relationship is available to stream on DStv Catch Up here.

WATCH THE COUPLE EXCHANGE THEIR VOWS HERE:
description: TV personality Dineo Moeketsi provided her 1 million Instagram followers with a 360-degree view of her sparkly yellow diamond wedding ring.
